title: ISic000135. Funerary inscription for Auctarius
body:
Facsimile Images

1AUCTARIO
2PRIMIGEN͡IF
3[..]...XXI

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on autopsy;
  • 2: Ferrua: Primigene
  • 3: Ferrua: [vix(it) ann(os)] XXI; Bivona: [v(ixit) an]n(is) XXI

English translation

To Auctarius, son of Primigenius. He lived 21 years.

commentary

Ferrua failed to observe the ligature and interpuncts in line 2, in what was clearly a quick and hasty reading.

bibliography

  • 1977.0335 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 54 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Ferrua 1941 260 no.17 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002655
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
